Context:
The students of George Brown College's School of Media and Performing Arts will broadcast live performances on YouTube in June 2021. Instead of admission fees for these performances, donations are being requested for the COVID-19 Student Emergency Relief Fund. This fund supports George Brown College students who have faced financial hardships due to the pandemic. Donors will receive a tax receipt via email for donations of $20 or more. For more information on making a donation or other ways to support, contact Gabriella Goutam at gabriella.goutam@georgebrown.ca or 416-415-5000 ext. 3289. For inquiries about the Paradise Lost play, please contact Cindy Bautista at Cindy.Bautista@georgebrown.ca.

The George Brown College Foundation manages the COVID-19 Student Emergency Relief Fund and can be reached at ask.george@georgebrown.ca or 416-415-2000. TTY inquiries should be made to 1-877-515-5559.

For more information, visit the college's social media hub and sign up for updates on application deadlines, college news, events, tours, and more at the provided link. Note that the information contained in this website is subject to change without notice.
